name: Comité européen interprofessionnel du thon tropical
boss: Juan Manuel VIEITES BAPTISTA DE SOUSA
goal:
The mission of EUROTHON is to support the growth, development and understanding of the European Tropical Tuna sector in a complex world where international interactions are crucial.

Fields of interest to EUROTHON:
•International and EU Trade agreements and regulations
•Fisheries partnership agreements and sustainable fisheries regulations
•Promotion of the sustainable management of tuna fisheries through the Regional Fisheries Management Organizations (RFMOs) and FIP's (Fisheries improvment Projects)
•Harmonization and management of sanitary rules concerning the tuna branch;
•Common marketing standards for tuna products;
•Technical and economical views on Tuna Markets;
•Promotion of canned tuna consumption in the EU market
•EU Tropical Tuna Fishing Fleet
•EU Tuna canning companies, their canneries in EU territories and their investments in some developing regions (African ACP, Latin America)
interests: Competition, Customs, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Trade
euInitiatives: EU Trade Negotiations, CFP, sustainable resources, Fisheries control regulation, Fight against IUU Fishing, Food Hygiene Regulations, CMO, Marketing standards
